citations.title: Li Auto Inc. Hosts Family Tech Day
citations.summary: Li Auto Inc. has optimized its battery cells and upgraded its thermal management system to achieve a maximum 5C charging rate, allowing for peak charging power exceeding 500 kW. The company is also constructing its own 5C supercharging network and has initiated beta testing for its city Navigation on Autopilot (NOA) feature in Beijing and Shanghai, set for June. As a leader in China's new energy vehicle market, Li Auto focuses on creating premium smart electric vehicles and enhancing user experience through technological innovations.

citations.title: Li Auto Inc. July 2024 Delivery Update
citations.summary: Li Auto Inc. reported that the Li L6 model has consistently achieved over 20,000 monthly deliveries, solidifying its status in the RMB200,000 to RMB300,000 price segment. The company launched OTA versions 6.0 and 6.1 in July, which provided substantial upgrades in autonomous driving, smart space, and smart electric features across the Li L series and Li MEGA. Additionally, advancements in their autonomous driving technology, based on an end-to-end architecture and vision-language models, have been positively received by users, enhancing the overall value of their products.

citations.title: Li Auto Inc. Hosts 2024 Spring Launch Event
citations.summary: Li Auto Inc. launched its flagship family MPV, Li MEGA, at the 2024 Spring Launch Event, featuring an 800-volt battery electric platform. The vehicle is equipped with a Li Auto-CATL Qilin 5C battery, offering a total capacity of 102.7 kWh and a CLTC range of 710 kilometers. With Li Auto's 5C supercharging stalls, the Li MEGA can achieve a driving range of 500 kilometers after just a 12-minute charge, providing a refueling experience comparable to traditional internal combustion engine vehicles.

citations.title: Li Auto Inc. November 2023 Delivery Update
citations.summary: Li Auto Inc. has introduced a voice assistant powered by its self-developed large model, designed to assist with driving, travel, entertainment, and educational content for younger passengers. Additionally, the company has implemented a new AC Eco mode utilizing its thermal management system and XCU controller, which enhances battery driving range by 15% to 20% in winter conditions. In November 2023, Li Auto delivered 41,030 vehicles, marking a 172.9% year-over-year increase, and surpassing its 2023 delivery target of 300,000 vehicles with a total of 325,677 deliveries year-to-date.

citations.title: Li Auto Inc. February 2025 Delivery Update
citations.summary: In February 2025, Li Auto Inc. released OTA update version 7.1, enhancing its autonomous driving and smart space systems. The update improved the Li AD Max V13's performance in complex driving conditions and introduced new features like Sentry Mode High-Risk Video Remote Preview and Front Passenger Exit Alert. The company also revealed the exterior design of its first battery electric SUV.

citations.title: Li Auto Inc. November 2024 Delivery Update
citations.summary: In November 2024, Li Auto Inc. reported that over 70% of orders for models priced above RMB300,000 and over 80% for those above RMB400,000 were fulfilled. The company released OTA update version 6.5, which introduced a one-click point-to-point autonomous driving feature for Li AD Max users, utilizing end-to-end (E2E) and vision-language model (VLM) technologies. Li Auto maintained its leading position in the RMB200,000 and above passenger vehicle market, with the Li L6 achieving over 160,000 cumulative deliveries, driven by increased demand for models equipped with the advanced Li AD Max system.
